name: 3oalem4
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: -| wceq(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)))

stmt.origin: eqsstri(c0, cfv(cort, c1), cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)))

body.origin:

-| wss(cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)))
-| wss(cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, c1))

body.origin: |- wss(cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, c1))

comment: Lemma for 3OA (weak) orthoarguesian law. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
